item.title: Canada's Indigenous governor general to visit Greenland as Trump renews talk of annexing it
item.description: Canada's Indigenous governor general and its foreign minister will visit Greenland in early February, Prime Minister Mark Carney said Tuesday.

item.title: 5 questions about Trump's transformation of the Jan. 6 narrative
item.description: Americans have shifted their focus to issues like immigration and economic concerns that helped propel Mr. Trump back to the White House in 2024.
